uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.motor

Interface CBuilder


  • public interface CBuilder
    Provides mechanisms for building a Frames Model (FM), as represented by a CModel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CFrame addFrame(CIdentity identity, boolean hidden)
      Creates a new atomic-frame and adds it to the model.
      void addListener(CBuildListener listener)
      Adds a listener for events occuring during with the build process.
      void addSectionBuilder(CSectionBuilder sectionBuilder)
      Adds a section-builder to build a section of the model.
      CModel build()
      Builds the model, which will incorporate all entities provided by the various section-building mechanisms.
      void clearSectionBuilders()
      Removes all section-builders that have been added.
      java.util.List<CSectionBuilder> getAllSectionBuilders()
      Retrieves all section-building mechanisms that will be used in creating the model.
      CAnnotationsEditor getFrameAnnotationsEditor(CFrame frame)
      Provides an editor for annotations on the specified frame.
      CFrameEditor getFrameEditor(CFrame frame)
      Provides an editor for the specified frame.
      CIdentifieds<CFrame> getFrames()
      Retrieves all frames in the model.
      CFrameSlotOrders getFrameSlotOrders()
      Provides the object for defining the required ordering, for purposes of presentaion to an end-user, of the slots associated with specific atomic-frames.

      Provides the editor that allows "under-the-hood" editing of model instantiations.

      Provides an editor for annotations on the model itself.

      Provides the unique root-frame for the model.

      Enables or disables the IUpdating.autoUpdate facility for the model.
      void setDefaultUpdateOp(IUpdateOp op, boolean enabled)
      Resets default enabled-status for a specific instance-update operation, as represented via the IUpdating object for the model.

      Sets the instance-reasoner object for an existing atomic-frame.

    • Method Detail

      • setAutoUpdate

        void setAutoUpdate(boolean autoUpdate)
        Enables or disables the IUpdating.autoUpdate facility for the model. By default auto-update will be enabled.
        Parameters:
        autoUpdate - True if auto-update is to be enabled

      • setDefaultUpdateOp

        void setDefaultUpdateOp(IUpdateOp op,
                        boolean enabled)
        Resets default enabled-status for a specific instance-update operation, as represented via the IUpdating object for the model. If not reset the default enabled-status for each operation will be true.
        Parameters:
        op - Relevant instance-update operation
        enabled - Default enabled-status of operation

      • addListener

        void addListener(CBuildListener listener)
        Adds a listener for events occuring during with the build process.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to add

      • removeListener

        void removeListener(CBuildListener listener)
        Removes a listener for events occuring during with the build process.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to remove

      • addSectionBuilder

        void addSectionBuilder(CSectionBuilder sectionBuilder)
        Adds a section-builder to build a section of the model.
        Parameters:
        sectionBuilder - Section-builder to add

      • removeSectionBuilder

        void removeSectionBuilder(CSectionBuilder sectionBuilder)
        Removes the specified section-builder, if present.
        Parameters:
        sectionBuilder - Section-builder to add

      • removeSectionBuilders

        void removeSectionBuilders(java.lang.Class<? extends CSectionBuilder> type)
        Removes any section-builders of the specified type that have been added.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of section-builder to remove

      • clearSectionBuilders

        void clearSectionBuilders()
        Removes all section-builders that have been added.

      • addFrame

        CFrame addFrame(CIdentity identity,
                boolean hidden)
        Creates a new atomic-frame and adds it to the model.
        Parameters:
        identity - Identify of frame to create
        hidden - True if created frame is to be a "hidden" frame
        Returns:
        Created frame
        Throws:
        uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.KAccessException - if frame with specified identity already exists

      • resolveFrame

        CFrame resolveFrame(CIdentity identity,
                    boolean hidden)
        Either retrieves an existing atomic-frame with the specified identity or, if no such frame currently exists, creates a new atomic-frame and adds it to the model.
        Parameters:
        identity - Identify of frame to retrieve or create
        hidden - True if created frame, or existing frame, is to be a "hidden" frame (if already defined as hidden, a value of false will have no effect)
        Returns:
        Retrieved or created frame

      • removeFrame

        boolean removeFrame(CIdentity identity)
        Removes the specified atomic-frame from the model, if possible. Does nothing if frame is not part of the current model, or if it has a CSource.internal() source. If removed then direct hierarchical links will be created from each sub-frame to each super-frame.
        Parameters:
        identity - Identify of frame to be removed
        Returns:
        True if frame was removed

      • setIReasoner

        void setIReasoner(CFrame frame,
                  IReasoner iReasoner)
        Sets the instance-reasoner object for an existing atomic-frame.
        Parameters:
        frame - Frame whose instance-reasoner is to be set
        iReasoner - Instance-reasoner for frame

      • getFrameSlotOrders

        CFrameSlotOrders getFrameSlotOrders()
        Provides the object for defining the required ordering, for purposes of presentaion to an end-user, of the slots associated with specific atomic-frames.
        Returns:
        Object for defining frame-slot orderings

      • getAllSectionBuilders

        java.util.List<CSectionBuilder> getAllSectionBuilders()
        Retrieves all section-building mechanisms that will be used in creating the model.
        Returns:
        All section-building mechanisms

      • getSectionBuilder

        <B extends CSectionBuilder> B getSectionBuilder(java.lang.Class<B> type)
        Retrieves a required section-building mechanism as specified via the relevant java class.
        Type Parameters:
        B - Generic version of type
        Parameters:
        type - Java class of required section-building mechanism
        Returns:
        Required section-building mechanism

      • getRootFrame

        CFrame getRootFrame()
        Provides the unique root-frame for the model.
        Returns:
        Root-frame for model

      • getFrames

        CIdentifieds<CFrame> getFrames()
        Retrieves all frames in the model.
        Returns:
        All frames in model

      • getFrameEditor

        CFrameEditor getFrameEditor(CFrame frame)
        Provides an editor for the specified frame.
        Parameters:
        frame - Frame for which editor is required
        Returns:
        Editor for specified frame

      • getSlotEditor

        CSlotEditor getSlotEditor(CSlot slot)
        Provides an editor for the specified slot.
        Parameters:
        slot - Slot for which editor is required
        Returns:
        Editor for specified slot

      • getModelAnnotationsEditor

        CAnnotationsEditor getModelAnnotationsEditor()
        Provides an editor for annotations on the model itself.
        Returns:
        Editor for model annotations

      • getFrameAnnotationsEditor

        CAnnotationsEditor getFrameAnnotationsEditor(CFrame frame)
        Provides an editor for annotations on the specified frame.
        Parameters:
        frame - Frame for which editor is required
        Returns:
        Editor for relevant frame annotations

      • getSlotAnnotationsEditor

        CAnnotationsEditor getSlotAnnotationsEditor(CIdentity slotId)
        Provides an editor for annotations on the specified slot-set.
        Parameters:
        slotId - Identity of slots in slot-set for which editor is required
        Returns:
        Editor for relevant slot-set annotations

      • getIEditor

        IEditor getIEditor()
        Provides the editor that allows "under-the-hood" editing of model instantiations.
        Returns:
        Under-the-hood editor for model instantiations

      • build

        CModel build()
        Builds the model, which will incorporate all entities provided by the various section-building mechanisms. Subsequent invocations will cause any section-builders for which the CSectionBuilder.supportsIncrementalBuild() flag is set to perform appropriate incremental updates.
        Returns:
        Built/updated model

      • optimiseSubsumptionTesting

        void optimiseSubsumptionTesting()
        Performs subsumption-check optimisations on partially built model. Should be invoked at strategic points in the build process after which subsequent model-building will be heavily dependent on subsumption-checks within the currently built sections.
